Reviews.Title: A basic phone that works
Reviews.Author: A reader
Reviews.Content: I needed to replace my old cell phone but did not want to pay for the digital plan. I like the VX8550 because it is compact when not in use and, because it is a slider, has a comfortable size when in use. In addition, the VX8550 does not have the disadvantage of flip phones that open at random when they are in a belt clip. The screen is large enough for me to read, even wearing my bifocals. The functions I use (calling, texting, calendar, alarm clock, and occasionally taking pictures) are straightforward.

Reviews.Title: Gets the job done
Reviews.Author: Anne
Reviews.Content: My daughter's phone broke with 4 months to go before she's due for a replacement.  This phone cost less than the insurance deductible, so I bought it to get her through until her upgrade.  I also plan on holding on to it after her upgrade as a "backup" phone (you know, if one of ours ever takes a dunk or otherwise stops working, or even just to switch over for a day to avoid taking our nicer phones on a ski trip for instance).The battery that initially came with the phone was not OEM, and did not properly fit the phone.  Customer service was very helpful and promptly sent out a replacement battery that is OEM and fits perfectly.  Overall very happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: worked for me
Reviews.Author: Miss April
Reviews.Content: Bought it used to charge a battery for my chocolate phone to get pictures. Its an okay used phone. Received it sooner than anticipated. No complaints.

Reviews.Title: read this before purchasing:

Reviews.Content: Terrible phone. I had this phone for about a month and the track wheel popped off and the number pad stopped working.The phone was built for music but you cant download music becuase it runs through verizons vcast(which is discontinued) even if you were able to get music the head phone jack is two small for any US headphones. This sucks because this phone was geared tward music.

Reviews.Title: Was not as advertised
Reviews.Author: Mitchell Lee
Reviews.Content: Was not as advertisedThe phone was advertised as new but it is not. The camera lens is cracked. The phone did not come in LG VX8550 factory packaging but a white box with a sticker label. Feel like I was rooked.

Reviews.Title: I'm Returning This ASAP
Reviews.Author: Catherine Conley
Reviews.Content: I am returning this phone as soon as I can find a new one. Functionality-wise, it stores each text message individually and anytime the phone slides shut you lose a text in progress. There is no way to adjust this setting, I looked. Also the phone is broken. Half the time the face buttons (left, right, speaker, clear) don't work and if you press the clear button twice (accidentally or because it didn't work the first time), a Verizon app ad shows up. This also causes you to lose text messages. Unfortunately I'm stuck with this thing until I can find a new one.

Reviews.Title: Best Slide Phone
Reviews.Author: Stefan
Reviews.Content: I had this phone a while back when it first came out and had to replace it with another phone once I stepped on it accidentally. After having a different basic slide phone, I came back to this one. This may sound like a strange quality of the phone, but the old slide phone(not the chocolate) left an imprint of the phone casing in my jeans. This chocolate has a design that will not leave an imprint from being in your pocket of a pair of jeans.

Reviews.Title: THIS PHONE SUCKS
Reviews.Author: Ole
Reviews.Content: The phone is a good phone but it gets really bad service and doesn't hold a charge for more than three and a half hours I would not recommend this phone to anybody.

Reviews.Title: Don't do it!

Reviews.Content: Having owned several smart phonesdowngrading to save on data charges has been difficult to handle.Phone is decent, but slow in comparison to the competition.

Reviews.Title: It's a Slider!!!
Reviews.Author: Valerie Gresham
Reviews.Content: The phone it self was nice but I bought it for my daughter who texts a lot, so it lasted all of thirty days. lol  The slider is most definitely not a good option for her. Now it's loose and she wants another. The overall service was excellent. The phone was in good shape to say it was used.

Reviews.Title: Used phone
Reviews.Author: Angela
Reviews.Content: This is a terrible phone, I regret buying this phone. The entire front of the phone is scratched and burnt. The picture did not show the actual phone being sold, I wouldn't have bought that phone even if is used.
